choose.when: and tm.moviecode=#{moviecode} and tm.theatercode=t.theatercode and tm.state=1

when.test: moviecode!=null and moviecode!='' and theatercode!=null and theatercode!=''

mapper.select: select st.screendate,st.screencode,s.theatercode from screen_time st,screen s where s.screencode=st.screencode
select rating,moviename,moviecode,movieimg from movie_m where state=1 order by count desc

select st.*,s.name from screen_time st, screen s where s.theatercode=#{theatercode} and st.screendate=#{screendate} and st.moviecode=#{moviecode} and st.screencode=s.screencode order by st.screendate,st.starttime asc

select DISTINCT s.name from screen_time st, screen s where s.theatercode=#{theatercode} and st.screendate=#{screendate} and st.moviecode=#{moviecode} and st.screencode=s.screencode order by s.name asc
select moviename,moviecode from movie_m where moviename like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' and state=1
select theatername,theatercode,area from theater where theatername like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' and state=1
